language.name: en
language.choosenextlevel: Please choose if you want to play this level again or if you want to choose a new level...
language.wantottry: You are out of moves. No worries, just hit the mix button and we will mix tiles for you!
language.areyousure: Are you sure you want to choose a new level?

language.name: nl
language.choosenextlevel: Kies hieronder of u dit level wilt herstarten of kies een nieuw level uit om te spelen...
language.wantottry: Er zijn geen combinaties meer mogelijk, maakt u zich geen zorgen, wij mixen de stenen voor u!
language.areyousure: Weet u zeker dat u een nieuw level wilt starten?

language.name: fr
language.choosenextlevel: Choisissez ci-dessous si vous voulez redémarrer ce niveau ou choisissez un nouveau niveau...
language.wantottry: Il n'y a plus de combinaisons possibles, mais ne vous inquiétez pas, nous allons mélanger les tuiles pour vous !
language.areyousure: Vous êtes sûr de vouloir commencer un nouveau niveau ?

language.name: de
language.choosenextlevel: Wähle ein neues Spiel aus oder starte dieses Level erneut!
language.wantottry: Es sind keine Kombinationen mehr möglich. Die Steine werden neu ausgeteilt.
language.areyousure: Bist Du Dir sicher, dass Du ein neues Level starten möchtest?

language.name: it
language.choosenextlevel: Scegli qui sotto se vuoi far ripartire questo livello o scegli un nuovo livello da giocare...
language.wantottry: Non potete più fare combinazioni, pensiamo noi a mischiare le tegole per voi...
language.areyousure: Sei sicuro di volere iniziare un nuovo livello?

language.name: es
language.choosenextlevel: Please choose if you want to play this level again or if you want to choose a new level...
language.wantottry: You are out of moves. No worries, just hit the mix button and we will mix tiles for you!
language.areyousure: Are you sure you want to start a new game?

language.areyousure: Are you sure you want to start a new game?

language.name: ro
language.choosenextlevel: Apăsați pe butonul de jos, dacă doriți să reîncepeți acest nivel sau alegeți un alt nivel...
language.wantottry: Nu mai aveți combinații posibile, dar nu vă speriați, pentru că vă vom amesteca pisele!
language.areyousure: Sunteți sigur că doriți să începeți un nou nivel?
